/* ---refresh 高端用法----  只传变||只传值*/
chart.refresh({
    transferData: {
        bodySign: "1000040001",
        endTime: null,
        energyTypeId: 1,
        isArea: false,
        isThumbnail: false,
        isEqument: false,
        sign: "1",
        startTime: "1376928000000",
        timestep: 1,
        number: 10000
    }
});

/* ---refresh 高端大气上档次用法----*/
chart.refresh({
    number: 100000
}, function(status) {
    alert(status);
    alert(this.unit);
});

/* ---refresh 高端大气用法----*/
chart.refresh({
    transferData: {
        bodySign: "1000040001",
        endTime: null,
        energyTypeId: 1,
        isArea: false,
        isThumbnail: false,
        isEqument: false,
        sign: "1",
        startTime: "1376928000000",
        timestep: 1,
        number: 10000
    },
    url: "./chart",
    index: 0,
    pointHandler: function(option) {
        if (this.isLast) {
            this.color = "green";
        }
        if (this.isMin) {
            this.color = "blue";
        }
        if (this.isMax) {
            this.color = "red";
        }
    }
});
